snippet: The Ukrainian government and pro-Russian separatists on Wednesday accused each other of attempting to break a six-month-old peace agreement.
abstract: Artillery attacks from both Ukrainian military and pro-Russian separatists threaten six-month-old ceasefire agreement, with both sides blaming each other for latest escalation in fighting.
lead_paragraph: The Ukrainian government and pro-Russian separatists on Wednesday accused each other of attempting to break a six-month-old peace agreement.

headline.main: Ukraine: Cease-Fire Is Imperiled as Fighting Erupts
headline.print_headline: Europe; Ukraine: Cease-Fire Is Imperiled as Fighting Erupts

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe
